workflow.name: Monitor Zendesk churn risk signals, log in Sheets, and alert team in Slack
workflow.description:
## Description
Automatically detect customer churn risks from Zendesk tickets, log them into Google Sheets for tracking, and send instant Slack alerts to your customer success team. This workflow helps you spot unhappy customers early and take proactive action to reduce churn. üö®üìäüí¨

## What This Template Does
- Fetches Zendesk tickets daily on schedule (8:00 PM). ‚è∞
- Processes and formats ticket data into clean JSON (priority, age, urgency). üß†
- Identifies churn risks based on negative satisfaction ratings. ‚ö†Ô∏è
- Logs churn risk tickets into Google Sheets for analysis and reporting. üìà
- Sends formatted Slack alerts with ticket details to the CS team channel. üì¢

## Key Benefits
- Detects unhappy customers before they churn. üö®
- Centralized churn tracking for reporting and team reviews. üßæ
- Proactive alerts to reduce response delays. ‚è±Ô∏è
- Clean, structured ticket data for analytics and filtering. üîÑ
- Strengthens customer success strategy with real-time visibility. üåê

## Features
- Schedule Trigger ‚Äì Runs every weekday at 8:00 PM. üóìÔ∏è
- Zendesk Integration ‚Äì Fetches all tickets automatically. üé´
- Smart Data Processing ‚Äì Adds ticket age, urgency, and priority mapping. üßÆ
- Churn Risk Filter ‚Äì Flags tickets with negative satisfaction scores. üö©
- Google Sheets Logging ‚Äì Saves churn risk details with metadata. üìä
- Slack Alerts ‚Äì Sends formatted messages with ID, subject, rating, and action steps. üí¨

## Requirements
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted).
- Zendesk API credentials with ticket read access.
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials with write permissions.
- Slack Bot API credentials with channel posting permissions.
- Pre-configured Google Sheet for churn risk logging.

## Target Audience
- Customer Success teams monitoring churn risk. üë©‚Äçüíª
- SaaS companies tracking customer health. üöÄ
- Support managers who want proactive churn alerts. üõ†Ô∏è
- SMBs improving retention through automation. üè¢
- Remote CS teams needing instant notifications. üåê

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
- Connect your Zendesk, Google Sheets, and Slack credentials in n8n. üîë
- Update the Schedule Trigger (default: daily at 8:00 PM) if needed. ‚è∞
- Replace the Google Sheet ID with your churn risk tracking sheet. üìä
- Confirm the Slack channel ID for alerts (default: zendesk-churn-alerts). üí¨
- Adjust churn filter logic (default: satisfaction_score = "bad"). üéØ
- Run a test to fetch Zendesk tickets and validate Sheets + Slack outputs. ‚úÖ

workflow.name: Monitor Zendesk Churn Risk Signals and Notify CS Team in Slack

parameters.content:
## üì• Ticket Retrieval

Fetches all tickets from your Zendesk instance.

**üîß Customization Options:**
- Add filters for specific ticket types
- Limit to recent tickets (last 24h)
- Filter by organization or user segments
- Add status filters (open, pending, etc.)

**‚ö° Performance:** Handles 100+ tickets efficiently

## üîß Data Processing

Transforms raw Zendesk data into clean, structured format.

**‚ú® Enhancements added:**
- Ticket age calculation
- Priority level mapping
- Urgency flags
- Channel categorization
- Null value handling

**üìä Output:** Clean JSON ready for filtering and alerts

## ‚öñÔ∏è Churn Risk Filter

Identifies tickets with negative satisfaction scores.

**üéØ Current Logic:**
- satisfaction_score = "bad"

**üîÑ Extend to include:**
- Multiple bad ratings from same customer
- High-priority unresolved tickets
- Tickets open > 48 hours
- VIP customer complaints

**üìà Customize:** Adjust criteria based on your churn patterns

## üìã Tracking & Analytics

Logs all churn risk incidents to Google Sheets for analysis.

**üìä Captured Data:**
- Ticket details
- Satisfaction scores
- Timestamp
- Customer info

**üí° Use for:**
- Monthly churn reports
- Trend analysis
- Team performance tracking
- Customer health scoring

## üö® Instant Team Alerts

Sends formatted Slack message to your CS team channel.

**üì¢ Message includes:**
- Ticket ID & direct link
- Customer satisfaction rating
- Subject & description
- Clear action required

**üé® Customize:**
- Add @mentions for specific team members
- Include customer tier/value
- Add escalation buttons
- Format with Slack blocks for better UX

## üîß Automated Schedule Trigger

Daily Execution: Runs every day at 8:00 PM
‚öôÔ∏è Configuration:

Trigger Rule: 0 20 * * * (Cron expression) 

Timezone: Set to your local timezone 

Mode: Every Day

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
